title: Decanter And Stopper, ca. 1815–20
markings: Marks: bottom, raised, surrounding pontil: "WATERLOO CO. CORK"
provenance: W.G.T. Burne, London; 1963 Phelps Warren NY
description: Bulbous body, ring of molded vertical fluting bottom carrying over onto bottom; engraved border with initials I B H; 3 triple neck rings, evented lips; molded mushroom shaped stopper, radially grooved; pontil mark bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Decanter And Stopper, ca. 1815–20.
ca. 1815–20. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-159-a,b.
